summary: In 1888 Amsterdam, a stubborn violin maker and his pharmacist cousin face hardship and tragedy as they oppose the powerful businessmen who plan to force him from his house and erect a luxurious new hotel in its place.
cast: Gijs Scholten van Aschat|Jacob Derwig|Rifka Lodeizen|Zeb Troostwijk|Juda Goslinga|Elisabeth Hesemans|Joosje Duk|Sander van Amsterdam|Houk van Warmerdam|Thomas Cammaert|Leon Voorberg|John Leddy|Tobias Kersloot|Peter Blankenstein|Hanne Arendzen|Walter Bart|Ronald de Bruin|Anne May De Lijser|Herman Egberts|Hubert Fermin|Patrick McCullough|Kirsten Mulder|Lykele Muus|Martijn Nieuwerf|Wouter Peek|Vilma Szécsi|Ids van der Krieke|René van Zinnicq Bergman|Jos Smit
title: Nobles intenciones
